prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Point Loma Theosophical Institute postcards, MSS 0214. Mandeville Special Collections Library, UCSD.

odd.head: ABSTRACT
odd.p: Fifteen postcards depicting various buildings and landscapes of the Point Loma Theosophical Institute in San Diego in the early twentieth century. Seven of the images are of the gate to the institute; five are of the Greek Theatre; and three are of the Temple of Peace. Nine of the postcards are inscribed and addressed to various persons.
